author: Deleted User
content:
Hi everyone, is there a report or data on what the median storage size for contracts is in the Storage Trie?
I would like to get data on median contract sizes plus their storage. I was not able to find any reports. 
Thank you üôè

author: pipermerriam
content: This would be a nice data set to generate.  I'm not aware of any existing data for this but I'd be very interested in it if you find it (or make it!)

author: pipermerriam
content: Histogram of contract storage sizes would be nice.

author: Deleted User
content: I will try to find whether it is already done by someone else. If not I will try to generate it myself when I have the time. Maybe on the weekend. Thanks for the info though!

author: schone_wizard
content: does anyone know of a command line tool like ``ethdo`` for ETH1 that allows you to play with the mnemonic + derivation path?

author: pipermerriam
content: not command line, but this implements the HD wallet spec: https://github.com/ethereum/py-hdwallet
